introduction: Shaman’s Quest is a series of stories about a guy called Tuck, who solves usual problems by unusual means. Being neighbors with a giant pelican, surviving the attack of a huge mammoth, global warming, dealing with a snowman, moving to a new iceberg - this is Tuck’s everyday routine. His deer and tambourine help him survive through these troubles and keep his wool on. In worst-case scenarios there is also a hypno-shaman who lives on a mountain and who can rescue Tuck.简单来说就是：描述生活在冰原上的俄罗斯战斗民族萨满一家，和他们彪悍的生活日常。
